metadata.title: CVE-2023-5197 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's netfilter: nf_tablescomponent can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. Additionand removal of rules from chain bindings within the same transaction causesleads to use-after-free. We recommend upgrading past commitf15f29fd4779be8a418b66e9d52979bb6d6c2325.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-5197` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-5.4.0-9-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-generic - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-lowlatency - 5.4.0-9.12
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-9-snapdragon - 5.4.0-9.12
No subscription required
